SELECT DISTINCT m.id, m.parent_id, m.menu_name, m.href, m.perms, m.menu_type, m.icon, m.order_sort, m.create_time FROM sys_menu m LEFT JOIN sys_role_menu rm ON m.id = rm.menu_id LEFT JOIN sys_user_role ur ON rm.role_id = ur.role_id LEFT JOIN sys_role ro ON ur.role_id = ro.id WHERE ur.user_id = #{userId} and m.menu_type in ('M', 'C') and m.visible = 0 AND ro.status = 0
ORDER BY m.order_sort
